name: I'm Late (Jia Ching)
description:
A game designed to juxtapose our daily lives as we encounter obstacles when we are already late.

Instructions

Click on the obstacles to grapple.

If crosshair turns blue means is grapplable within distance.

Reach the top to win!

Credits
